tool.summary:
Calculating fuzzy valley and ridge class memberships using the Top Hat approach. Based on the AML script 'tophat' by Jochen Schmidt, Landcare Research.
References: Rodriguez, F., Maire, E., Courjault-Rad'e, P., Darrozes, J. (2002): The Black Top Hat function applied to a DEM: a tool to estimate recent incision in a mountainous watershed. (Estib`ere Watershed, Central Pyrenees). Geophysical Research Letters, 29(6), 9-1 - 9-4.
